prompt: A group of suitors gather at the palace, each hoping to win Helen's hand in marriage. Menelaus stands at the front, looking confident and strong. The other suitors sit on benches behind him, their faces a mix of determination and nervousness. The palace is adorned with intricate carvings and frescoes, with a high ceiling that stretches up to the top of the panel. The lighting is soft and warm, with a slight golden glow coming from the torches on the walls.
dialogue: Suitors from around the world came to seek Helen's hand in marriage, bringing rich gifts with them. I propose that before the decision is made, all of you should swear a most solemn oath to defend the chosen husband against whoever should quarrel with him.
